name: EPIC THEATER
description:
We strongly recommend to play in full screen mode!

Our game is simple. You are theater-master. Your goal is to seat your visitors (elf, gnomes and orcs) right, so they would fit into their chairs and won’t kill each other. You can improve your theater so that guests with the best reputation go to you. When you reach a 1000 respect point, you will win the game.
